#license
# Code generated by gen_template, DO NOT EDIT.
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.25)
project(bm2kaitai)
set(CMAKE_RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/tool)
add_executable(bm2kaitai main.cpp bm2kaitai.cpp)
target_include_directories(bm2kaitai PRIVATE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/..")
target_link_libraries(bm2kaitai futils bm)
install(TARGETS bm2kaitai DESTINATION tool)
if ("$ENV{BUILD_MODE}" STREQUAL "web")
  install(FILES "${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/tool/bm2kaitai.wasm" DESTINATION tool)
endif()
